item.title: Install Docker Compose
item.description: 1sudo yum install epel-release 2sudo yum install -y python-pip 3sudo pip install docker-compose Further details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-use-docker-compose-on-centos-7
